text: Ma di god i golo guu daa ana daangada gi daha mo tuai henua belee hai nia daangada ni aana, be di hai a Dimaadua di godou God dela ne hai adu gi goodou i Egypt?! Goodou guu mmada gi godou golomada donu bolo ma go Mee dela ne wanga gi digaula nia magi huaidu mo tauwa mai i ono mahi mogobuna, ge e hai nia hagadilinga mogobuna haga goboina mono mogobuna hagamadagudagu dangada.
